name: Notion Components
description: Notion Components are ready-to-use building blocks that you can copy and paste to create visually appealing websites on the fly. The concept of components is extremely popular in modern front-end development. But you don’t have to be a developer in order to use these components and build your website. You also don’t need a premium version of Notion.This collection features 50+ components and third-party product recommendations that can be used to build: minimalistic portfolio websites quick prod
features: minimalistic portfolio websites; quick product pages; sleek landing pages; stunning blogs; corporate websites; and so much more!
